desc: As the first update to Microsoft’s server operating system in nearly five years, Windows Server 2008 boasts the new Internet Information Services 7.0 (IIS 7), which is the largest departure from previous versions of IIS ever. Written by an author team that includes four Microsoft MVPs, this book shows you how to take advantage of these exciting new features of IIS 7. With a clear understanding of IIS 7, you’ll learn to deploy, install, monitor, manage, and secure an IIS environment with confidence and ease.

details.authors: Kenneth Schaefer, Rob Baugh, Mike Everest

title: Professional IIS 7
